snippet: A man charged with having once possessed the gun that prosecutors believe the Boston Marathon bombing suspects used to kill an MIT police officer pleaded guilty Friday to gun possession and drug charges....

headline.print_headline: Man Pleads Guilty in Gun Case Linked to Marathon
headline.main: Man Pleads Guilty in Gun Case Linked to Marathon

lead_paragraph: A man charged with having once possessed the gun that prosecutors believe the Boston Marathon bombing suspects used to kill an MIT police officer pleaded guilty Friday to gun possession and drug charges.
